text: Mésanger is a commune. It is in the Pays de la Loire region in the Loire- Atlantique department in western France. == Geography == The town has an area of 49.75 square kilometers (4,975 hectares). The area around Mésanger has many open fields. Most of the land is used for growing grain. The land is a little hilly. The lowest point is 9 meters high and the highest is 77 meters. The main village is in a small valley. Category:Communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: Mésanger
